mapper.select: insert into apply(user_id, name, number,accepted) value (#{userId},#{accountName},#{accountNumber},0)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (email, password, name, nickname, phone, created_at) VALUES (#{email}, #{password}, #{name}, #{nickname}, #{phone}, now())
mapper.select: SELECT email FROM user WHERE email = #{email};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO editor_detail(user_id, profile_image, introduce, thumbnail, content, vrm) VALUES (#{userId}, #{profileImage}, #{introduce}, #{thumbnail}, #{content}, #{vrm})
mapper.select: select ed.editor_id, ed.user_id, ed.profile_image, ed.introduce, ed.thumbnail, ed.content, replace(ed.vrm,"\\",'/') as vrm, u.nickname from editor_detail ed left join user u on u.user_id = ed.user_id where ed.editor_id = #{editorId};
SELECT vrm FROM editor_detail WHERE editor_id = #{editorId}

SELECT e.editor_id, profile_image, introduce, nickname, COALESCE(ROUND(avg(r.count / 2), 1), 0.0) as count, e.thumbnail FROM editor_detail e LEFT JOIN user u ON e.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN review r ON e.editor_id = r.editor_id GROUP BY e.editor_id, profile_image, introduce, nickname LIMIT #{offset},#{countPerPage}
SELECT user_id FROM editor_detail WHERE editor_id = #{editorId}
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET point = ifnull(point,0) + #{point} WHERE user_id = (SELECT user_id FROM editor_detail WHERE editor_id = #{editorId})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO price (editor_id, options, price) VALUES (#{editorId}, #{options}, #{price})
INSERT INTO calculator (editor_id, cal_price, created_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{point}, now());
mapper.select: SELECT count(user.user_id) FROM user WHERE user.nickname = #{nickname}
